languages.text: "Вы оставили Вистенцу в живых... даже после обвинений в ереси. Конечно, источник сих обвинений весьма неблагонадежен, однако это не повод оставлять ее и ее прихвостней с развязанными руками".

traits.locale_text: "Вы оставили Вистенцу в живых... даже после обвинений в ереси. Конечно, источник сих обвинений весьма неблагонадежен, однако это не повод оставлять ее и ее прихвостней с развязанными руками".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "You left Vistenza alive... even after the charges of heresy were laid against her. The source of the accusations was highly unreliable, of course, but that is no reason to leave her and her cronies at liberty."
languages.original_text: "Вы оставили Вистенцу в живых... даже после обвинений в ереси. Конечно, источник сих обвинений весьма неблагонадежен, однако это не повод оставлять ее и ее прихвостней с развязанными руками".

traits.locale_text: "You left Vistenza alive... even after the charges of heresy were laid against her. The source of the accusations was highly unreliable, of course, but that is no reason to leave her and her cronies at liberty."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You left Vistenza alive... even after the charges of heresy were laid against her. The source of the accusations was highly unreliable, of course, but that is no reason to leave her and her cronies at liberty."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You left Vistenza alive... even after the charges of heresy were laid against her. The source of the accusations was highly unreliable, of course, but that is no reason to leave her and her cronies at liberty."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You left Vistenza alive... even after the charges of heresy were laid against her. The source of the accusations was highly unreliable, of course, but that is no reason to leave her and her cronies at liberty."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “维丝坦萨被指控犯下了异端罪行……可你却饶了她一命。当然，指控的来源确实非常不可靠，但这并不是让她和她的亲信逍遥法外的理由。”
languages.original_text: "You left Vistenza alive... even after the charges of heresy were laid against her. The source of the accusations was highly unreliable, of course, but that is no reason to leave her and her cronies at liberty."

traits.locale_text: “维丝坦萨被指控犯下了异端罪行……可你却饶了她一命。当然，指控的来源确实非常不可靠，但这并不是让她和她的亲信逍遥法外的理由。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Ha dejado viva a Vistenza a pesar de los cargos de herejía que pesan contra ella. Aunque la fuente de las acusaciones carezca de credibilidad, eso no es motivo para dejarles libres a ella y a sus cómplices».
languages.original_text: "You left Vistenza alive... even after the charges of heresy were laid against her. The source of the accusations was highly unreliable, of course, but that is no reason to leave her and her cronies at liberty."

traits.locale_text: «Ha dejado viva a Vistenza a pesar de los cargos de herejía que pesan contra ella. Aunque la fuente de las acusaciones carezca de credibilidad, eso no es motivo para dejarles libres a ella y a sus cómplices».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたはヴィステンツァを生かした…異端の容疑がかけられた後も。もちろん、告発の出所は非常に信頼できないものではあった、だが、だからといって彼女とその取り巻きを自由にさせておく理由にはならない」
languages.original_text: "You left Vistenza alive... even after the charges of heresy were laid against her. The source of the accusations was highly unreliable, of course, but that is no reason to leave her and her cronies at liberty."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはヴィステンツァを生かした…異端の容疑がかけられた後も。もちろん、告発の出所は非常に信頼できないものではあった、だが、だからといって彼女とその取り巻きを自由にさせておく理由にはならない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez laissé la vie sauve à Vistenza... alors même qu'elle était accusée d'hérésie. Certes, la source de ces accusations n'était peut-être pas tout à fait fiable, mais ce n'est pas une raison pour les laisser en liberté, elle et toute sa clique. »
languages.original_text: "You left Vistenza alive... even after the charges of heresy were laid against her. The source of the accusations was highly unreliable, of course, but that is no reason to leave her and her cronies at liberty."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez laissé la vie sauve à Vistenza... alors même qu'elle était accusée d'hérésie. Certes, la source de ces accusations n'était peut-être pas tout à fait fiable, mais ce n'est pas une raison pour les laisser en liberté, elle et toute sa clique. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt Vistenza am Leben gelassen ... selbst nachdem sie der Ketzerei angeklagt wurde. Die gegen sie vorgebrachten Anschuldigungen kamen aus höchst unzuverlässiger Quelle, aber das ist kein Grund, sie und ihre Kumpanen einfach auf freiem Fuß zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "You left Vistenza alive... even after the charges of heresy were laid against her. The source of the accusations was highly unreliable, of course, but that is no reason to leave her and her cronies at liberty."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Vistenza am Leben gelassen ... selbst nachdem sie der Ketzerei angeklagt wurde. Die gegen sie vorgebrachten Anschuldigungen kamen aus höchst unzuverlässiger Quelle, aber das ist kein Grund, sie und ihre Kumpanen einfach auf freiem Fuß zu lassen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Aleyhine kâfirlik suçlamaları yöneltildiği hâlde Vistenza'yı sağ bıraktın. Elbette o iddiaların kaynağı hiçbir şekilde güven teşkil etmiyordu ancak bu, onu ve dostlarını özgür bırakmak için yeterli bir sebep değil."
languages.original_text: "You left Vistenza alive... even after the charges of heresy were laid against her. The source of the accusations was highly unreliable, of course, but that is no reason to leave her and her cronies at liberty."
